name: The Strange Case of Sophia's Daughter
name_original: The Strange Case of Sophia's Daughter
description:
Description

Tony was living a perfectly lovely high school life until his childhood friend comes back to haunt him -- literally. The dead girl has seemingly put a curse on him, making Tony's life a living nightmare. How will he manage his guilt, misfortune, and blossoming feelings for his once-forgotten friend?

The Strange Case of Sophia's Daughter is a visual novel adapted from a short story I once wrote. I found it again recently and was inspired to recreate it as a game after falling in love with the characters all over again. I hope you enjoy reading this story as much as I enjoyed writing it!

Features
  • Two endings
  • NVL
  • 30-45 minutes of playtime
Extras

If you enjoyed the game, please consider donating! If you give $2.99 or more you can get all the art assets from my game and the source code for the RenPy project. I used a lot of custom code to make NVL mode work properly in RenPy, so I hope the code will help you with your own RenPy projects! If you downloaded the source files, please feel free to DM me @rikichiiii on Twitter for any questions!
